name: UniCorn - Born from Corn
description:
Everyone loves Unicorns, make your own by lobbing corncobs at animals!

In UniCorn your goal is to transform a normal regular horse into a magical unicorn by throwing a corncob at it. So it looks like a horn! Other animals can also become beautiful Unicorns if you manage to get a perfectly placed cob on its forehead, such as hencorn, goatcorn and llamacorn.

- Unlock new characters to play as

- Discover all the weird secrets

- Go up against increasingly more annoying animals

- Hit the magical rainbow cat to get a HUGE bonus

- Brag to your friends about your high score
